title: ThunderWay 4-Way Decorator Wall Light Switches with Wallplates, 15A 120/277V UL Listed - On/Off Paddle Rocker, Self-Grounding - Residential and Commercial Grade (White, Pack of 2)

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: Best Sellers Rank:  #77,214 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)    #258 in Electrical Light Switches       #258 in Electrical Light Switches

description: Upgrade Your Home Lighting Control with the 4-Way Decorator SwitchDesigned exclusively for 4-way applications, this top-tier wall switch is a perfect addition to your home's lighting setup. Note that it requires the integration of two 3-way wall switches (sold separately) for complete functionality.Versatile Wiring OptionsInstallation is made hassle-free with push-in or side wiring options, catering to #12-14 AWG copper wires exclusively. The device facilitates the control of a single load or lighting fixture from three distinct switch locations, offering convenience and flexibility in managing your home lighting.Effortless Installation ProcessFor side wiring, simply remove approximately 3/4" (1.9cm) of insulation and connect the wires following the provided diagram. Loop the wires clockwise around the terminal screws and firmly tighten for a secure connection. Alternatively, back wiring involves removing insulation according to the strip gauge on the device, approximately 1/2" (1.3cm), inserting wires into the designated holes adjacent to the appropriate terminal screws, and tightening them securely. Please note that both back and side wire terminal screws are designed to accept up to #12 AWG copper or copper-clad wires.Modernize Your SpaceElevate your home's aesthetic with this 4-way decorator switch's modern design. Control a single fixture from three separate switch locations, providing both functionality and a sleek appearance that enhances your room's overall look.Durable ConstructionCrafted from sturdy materials including impact-resistant polycarbonate thermoplastic and solid steel, this switch guarantees durability and reliability, ensuring a long-lasting addition to your home's electrical system.Transform the way you control your lighting fixtures and elevate the ambiance of your home with this reliable and stylish 4-way decorator switch.
shipping_info: FREE Wednesday, June 11 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Light Switches
feature_bullets: 4-Way Compatibility: Specifically designed for 4-way applications with a rating of 15A, 120V-277VAC. Compatible only in conjunction with two 3-way wall switches (sold separately)

Effortless Installation: Offers both quick push-in and side wiring options for easy setup. Terminal screws designed to accept up to 12AWG, while quick push-in wiring accommodates 14AWG solid copper wire

Universal Application: Suitable for both residential and commercial use, making it ideal for homes, condos, apartments, offices, schools, airports, retail stores, restaurants, coffee shops, hotels, and various other settings
Modern & Stylish Design: Enhance your room's aesthetics with a modern, decorative appearance. The on/off paddle rocker switches provide ease of control along with a sleek look
High-Quality Build: Constructed from impact-resistant polycarbonate thermoplastic and solid steel for durability and reliability, ensuring a sturdy build that lasts

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsQuality is great, and the price is right!
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Good quality switch, and a fraction of the price compared to HomeDepot,  and others.  I needed just one 4 way, but now have a back up incase I need it!

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2024

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 stars4-Way Decorator Wall Light Switches
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: 4-Way Decorator Wall Light Switches looks great, fits well. Easy to use and easy to take care. Made of durable and sturdy solid steel.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat set of decorator switches
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: This is a great set of decorator switches for use in a 3 or 4 way lighting situation. They are made with heavy duty plastic and the back terminals are very easy to use to put your wires into. I would definitely buy these again in the future.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: The function of the switch is not good ya have to push hard to get it were it needs to be

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Initial observation is that these are solid rock switches, everything looks and works as it should, they have their own cover plates so one less thing to buy. They are also UL certified so a piece of mind in installing these around the house.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: A 2-way switch connects or disconnects between two terminals. A 3-way switch connects the common terminal to either one of the terminals. A 4-way switch connects or disconnects two pairs of terminals. 4-way switch is needed if more than two switches control one light: two switches should be 3-way and all additional ones should be 4-way. Good switches test no continuity between terminals when disconnected and almost 0 ohms when connected. The 4-way switches looks like good quality upon physical examination. They test perfect functionally, as expected. Overall price is reasonable for two switches with cover plates.

customer_reviews.rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars5.0 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsPack of 2 light switches and wall plates
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: This is a two pack of light switches as well as the accompanying wall plates.  I switched out our old light switches because they were very old and showing signs of wear and tare.  This was a simple job, pull wires off the old switch and place them in the exact same spot on the new switches.  It literally took me less than ten minutes to replace each light switch.  It helped that these were the exact same color as well.  The difference now is that the old ones had dirt and grime as well as being loose when turning the switch on and off.  The new switch very audibly  "clicks" and is very is also very crisp in its action of pushing the switch on and off.  These seem decent for the price they're asking.  I woke recommend.
